problem.markdown: For a turbine: [x] The magnitude of [mathjaxinline]\Delta h*[/mathjaxinline] is greater than that of [mathjaxinline]\Delta h[/mathjaxinline]. [x] Entropy produced is greater than or equal to zero for the actual process. [ ] [mathjaxinline]\dot{W_s}[/mathjaxinline] is greater than [mathjaxinline]\dot{W_s*}[/mathjaxinline] [x] Power Output is greater than zero

checkboxgroup.choice: The magnitude of [mathjaxinline]\Delta h*[/mathjaxinline] is greater than that of [mathjaxinline]\Delta h[/mathjaxinline].
Entropy produced is greater than or equal to zero for the actual process.
Power Output is greater than zero
